ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: a slave when he goes to pray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A votary when he turns to his devotions?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a servant (of Allah) when he prays?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: a servant of Ours from prayer?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A bondman when he offers the prayer?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A bondman of Ours when he prayeth *
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A votary when he (turns) to pray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A slave (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) when he prays?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:10]   a servant, namely, Muhammad (s), when he prays?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: A slave) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) (when he prayeth) to Allah?
